response.overview: 2015 was the first season like a Ferrari driver for Sebastian Vettel. He was the only one, along with the Mercedes drivers (Lewis Hamilton and Nico Rosberg) that scored wins in 2015. Due to his regularity, the german driver achieved many podiums, helping him to keep chances in the championship battle until the last races. Reviewing an incredible year with good and bad moments. Enjoying the first year in red with Vettel.
response.title: Vettel: First Year in Red
